short_description: linde gas saudi arabia is a chemicals company based in saudi arabia.
long_description: about linde in saudi arabia. providing gases, services and expertise to contribute the manufacture of countless products. linde-sigas is the leading manufacturer of all bulk, industrial, medical and specialty gases in the kingdom of saudi arabia, with operational and sales outlets spread throughout major cities of the country. aside from reliable supply of gases of highest standards of purity and quality, we provide innovative solutions to make your business more productive. through our sister company, linde engineering, we are also able to supply world-scale gas processing plant solutions. find out more about our engineering services. linde-sigas headquarters are based in dammam, kingdom of saudi arabia , while our gases can be promptly delivered from the nationwide distribution network. linde is a leading global industrial gases and engineering company with 2021 sales of $31 billion (â‚¬26 billion). we live our mission of making our world more productive every day by providing high-quality solutions, technologies and services which are making our customers more successful and helping to sustain and protect our planet.

generated_description: linde saudi, legally known as linde saudi industrial gas company, based in dammam, eastern province, is a leading provider of industrial and medical gases in saudi arabia. the company supplies a wide range of gases, including argon, acetylene, co2, helium, nitrogen, oxygen, and medical gases, among others. linde saudi serves various industries such as food and beverage, welding, cutting, heating, aquaculture, metallurgy, chemicals, glass, plastic and rubber, electronics, oil and gas, and water and wastewater treatment. the company also offers gas processing plant solutions through its sister company, linde engineering. linde saudi is committed to delivering high-quality gases and innovative solutions to enhance business productivity and efficiency.
